question: 強盗
sourceMnemonic: You are <kanji>strong</kanji> so you break into someone's home, hold them up, then <kanji>steal</kanji> from them. Ha ha! Take that, next door neighbor! This is a <vocabulary>burglary</vocabulary> / <vocabulary>robbery</vocabulary>, depending on how crazy you get after you use that strength to break down that door.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading for <ja>強</ja> is all messed up. Think about how when you commit a <vocabulary>robbery</vocabulary>, you <reading>go</reading> (<ja>ごう</ja>) into someone's house, then you <reading>go</reading> to jail as well, if you're caught.
